description: I am a GOD fearing woman, I try to walk in the ways of Him. I would describe myself as sensitive, intelligent, and able to communicate on an emotional level. I am honest and unpretentious, and drawn to simple pleasures. I am a very happy person who does not take herself too seriously. I am compassionate, loving and free spirited. I love my daughter and she is the highlight of my life. I am looking for a sincere man who love GOD, who likes to laugh and want to share life together
